amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following new section: SEC. 4__. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to plan, design, study, or construct, for the purpose of harvesting timber by private entities or individuals, a forest development road in the Tongass National Forest.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used to plan, design, study, or construct, for the purpose of harvesting timber by private entities or individuals, a forest development road i the Tongass National Forest.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A035) Agreed to by recorded vote: 283 - 145 (Roll no. 563).

action.text: Mr. Young (AK) raised a point of order against the Andrews amendment (A035). Mr. Young of Alaska stated that the provisions of the amendment seek to impose new duties and constitute legislatiin an appropriations bill. Point of order overruled by the Chair.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Andrews.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A035) Agreed to by recorded vote: 283 - 145 (Roll no. 563).
